entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
